                                          throws java.lang.Throwable
        Execute a test and catch GRPC exceptions.
        Parameters:
        block - block to execute containing test.
        catchBlock - assertion block triggered, if and only if, GRPC exception is thrown
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - rethrown exceptions generated by either the @{block} or @{catchBlock}
